actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to cease all foreign aid to those Middle East nations that reduced the export of oil and oil products to the United States as a punitive reaction to U.S. support of Israel.

summary.text: Terminates all foreign aid to those Middle East nations that reduced the export of oil and oil products to the United States as a punitive reaction to United States support of Israel.

titles.title: A bill to cease all foreign aid to those Middle East nations that reduced the export of oil and oil products to the United States as a punitive reaction to U.S. support of Israel.
